api.name: log
api.description: Writes logging output to the console.

member.name: distance
member.description: Returns the **distance** the **fast dog** travels **in meters** (m).

params.name: d
params.description: The **distance** from the start position to the tree **in meters** (m).

params.name: s
params.description: The **speed** of the **slow dog** in **meters per second** (m/s).
